app.title: Revive: Animation & AI Photos
app.description:
Create face animation with Revive's AI photo generator. Try face filters for photos & create funny videos with our face app.

Revive is an animation creator. Using this photo animator you can easily make your face dance. It offers a handpicked selection of animation & funny video for pictures. Animate pictures to funny videos and make them stand out with a variety of trendy effects and sing like Monroe, Queen, Rihanna etc. You can also create cartoon animation with the meme maker option! Bring to live your boring avatars using AI video Generator!

Animation & funny videos

• Most beloved and trendy funny videos, memes & animations for pictures – CJ, Fifty Fifty, Jake Sully, Muppet Show, The sorting Hat. Boost your social media with eye-catching content
• Wide range of functions for animate pictures using our face app – make your face dance in funny videos
• Rich festive collection & animation effects: create Christmas, Halloween and Easter content using this photo animator
• In our face app is huge collection of collages & mood categories - try any animation according to your personal mood
• Animate your pet - bring your pet’s face dance 
• AI photo generator can revive any avatar with your own mimic
• Unique collection of fun Templates & AI filters
• Become a meme maker with our photo animator. Share your funny videos with your friends

AI video generator
• Upload and animate pictures
• Edit trendy memes, AI filters
• Transform your photos into real animations (add mimic or sing songs, dance, move). Become an animator and create your stories!
• Create unique face dance edits with a rich collection of effects & filters for animation.
• Stylize your content with a rich collection of retro celebrities – the 20s, 60s, 80s, 90s, 00s phrases.

Make your content stand out with our face app photo animator!

Revive makes any boring pictures weird and funny with the lip sync.
Start a conversation in a messenger, get comments on social media with your animated photos, or singing face, cool animation or AI video generator.

Discover the world of animation and AI filters with our advanced AI editing app that transforms your photos or cartoons into funny videos. Create animated AI avatars, artistic live portraits and dancing cartoons by turning your images into vibrant, lifelike animations. Experience the seamless blend of technology and creativity, as our AI effortlessly works its magic to enhance your photo & video editing process, helping you craft visually live AI avatars and portraits that stand out.

Create live portraits with a face animation in it for an instant effect.
Edit pictures, selfies, a meme with the animation creator. Make your photos sing & face app.
 
The best things you can do with the app

• Face filters & editor
• AI photo generator & meme maker
• Top phrases and songs from your favorite celebrities or actors, memes every day
• Tons of different animations that you can apply on your or friend’s pictures
• You can organize your challenges or even fun games in social networks with your audience in the entertainment world.
• Create funny videos or live photos
• Prank your family with animation face app

Get AI Video Generator

• Unlimited meme maker
• Animate Pictures to funny videos
• AI Art Generator & face app
• Special offers and festive discounts

Create funny Face Animation with AI Photo Generator. Try face filters for photos & videos!
----
In case of any questions, issues, or collaboration requests, contact us at hi@reviveapp.net

Terms and Conditions: https://reviveapp.net/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://reviveapp.net/privacy-policy/

app.summary: AI Hugs: picture to video. Animate photos with AI magic, bringing them to life

reviews.text: There is no free version. I watched the ads but it just starts over again unless I put in my credit card. I can sort of see the very blurry animation behind the credit card request. If you don't want to pay, don't bother installing. Update: watermark? No, the entire animation is completely blurred out with choices of what paid version you want in order to actually see it written all over it from top to bottom. If you continue without choosing or just x out, it just starts all over.
reviews.replyText: Hello. Our app has both free and paid versions. You can use the app for free, but it will have ads and a watermark on the content. If you have more questions, email us at hi@reviveapp.net

reviews.text: Just like most of the other users I downloaded to try the free ad supported version. The free ad supported version either doesn't exist or its impossible to get to. I've read all the dev responses about there being an ad supported version but when called out on it they just seem to double down on their reply. Either it's broke or a scam. Either way don't waste you're time. At least not until some serious issues are resolved.

I tried it, got some annoying ads, so purchased it for a week. It works flawlessly! I was up most of the night downloading Facebook friends' photos and creating some cool clips. Everyone was impressed with the results. The app even brought back some deceased relatives and friends life! Only one small complaint.... I can't get Bohemian Rapsiody's characters to come in correctly. I guess all the one star review folks just can't figure out the ease of this app. Good job, developers!

I first downloaded and used the free version of this app. Everyone I showed it to really enjoyed the videos. Was not so ready to jump on the bandwagon because of the available pricing plans. Finally ended up biting the bullet and purchased the lifetime Pro Plan. Was really surprised and pleased at the increased number and options that became available. I and many of my friends are outdoor sports enthusiasts. Would like some video options for fishermen (i.e. I'm gonna miss her).

The app is Hilarious and addictive! But good luck trying to cancel your membership. Like I said the app is great. Great enough that I wanted to purchase it instead of paying for it weekly. But when I looked in settings to switch there's no options to switch or cancel or anything. You have to scroll through terms and conditions and there's an email address buried way down the list. Then there's all these ridiculous cancelation rules. They made a great app & then they made it suck!
reviews.replyText: We are truly sad to hear about your decision. In order to cancel the subscription, go to PlayStore->Your profile->Payments&Subscriptions. Find the revive subscription and cancel it. If you won't see Revive in your subscription list it means that you're using the free version of the app with ads and watermarks. Just remove the app from your phone.

reviews.text: It would be a DEFINITE 5-STAR but you can never get it to work without jumping through a bunch of hurdles. As after you open the app you then have to turn WiFi off for the entire app to load and then to do the lip sync sometimes you have to flip back and forth turning WiFi off and on. It's a major headache. Even then it doesn't always work. But when/if you can actually use the app it's the best I've ever used. But that's a big "IF". Long time subscriber but not sure for how much longer.
reviews.replyText: Hi, have you tried the latest update? It seems to fix the issue for many of our users. If it doesn't work for you, could you contact us at hi@reviveapp.net so that we can work together to figure it out?

reviews.text: So far, this app is hilarious! We have used the free version, laughing until we cried and our stomachs hurt! The music clips are less than a minute, so I assume that the paid version are complete songs?? More variety of music?? Not sure. But before I handout $36.99 for the full version, I'd like to know more. It says, no watermark, exclusive sounds, and no ads. Also you can spend $2.99 for a week to start. It is excellent for a laugh. The eyes blink at times, eyebrows up and down! Try it!

This app is great! I had more fun making videos and sharing with friends and family with the free version, that I easily purchased the lifetime version! New songs are always being added. Some photos of pets can be used but not all will work right. Sometimes the song selected will not be the one that is correct but just go back and select again. Person selection doesn't always give the placement number, just highlighted frame, trial/retrial. Animations for face/mouth are phenomenal!!!
reviews.replyText: Hi! The free version has no restrictions on creating and downloading videos. The initial subscription offer can be ignored by tapping the "x" button. In case any other questions, please contact us at hi@reviveapp.net.

reviews.text: I originally gave this app 5 stars. I am dropping it to 4 stars because of the following: 1. I paid for the pro version since I was having a blast with it! After trying different songs a few times the audio and title list do not match up. When selecting a song such as " Sitting on the Dock of the Bay ", " Tom's Diner " starts playing. This happens to ALL titles and then, it unscrambles itself the next day. Please fix this issue and I'll change the rating to 5 stars.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your support, we will fix this issue soon.

reviews.text: This used to be an okay app. I could make as many clips as I wanted and just had to watch an ad before each one. (Im using the free version). Now if I try to do more then one clip I still get the ad like normal, but then a page wanting me to buy the pro version pops up. I cant close it and its blocking 80% of the clip i was making. I can use the back button to get rid of the pop up and then it plays another ad and deletes the clip. So i literally can only make one clip now or buy pro. Boooooo!
reviews.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience caused with the recent update. The intention was not to limit free users, but to showcase the benefits of Pro. We value your feedback and will review this issue to ensure a better experience for our free version users.

app.developerLegalAddress: C/O RWK GOODMAN LLP 69 Carter Lane, LONDON, EC4V 5EQ, United Kingdom
app.recentChanges: FYI: the Beatles are the only bugs allowed in our app.
app.AIReview:
Revive: Animation & AI Photos – A Detailed Review

Overview

Revive: Animation & AI Photos has quickly become one of the most downloaded apps in the Entertainment category, boasting over 13.2 million installs and a solid 4.25-star rating. The app’s core functionality revolves around transforming still photos into animated videos using artificial intelligence, primarily focusing on creating humorous and engaging content. The premise – allowing users to "animate photos with AI magic" – is undeniably appealing, particularly to those seeking easy tools for social media sharing and lighthearted entertainment. The app's description emphasizes a range of features including face animation, filters, video creation, and even mimicking the voices of famous singers. This ambitious scope aims to cater to a broad audience, from casual users wanting to add movement to their selfies to potentially more creative individuals seeking meme-making capabilities.

Key Features

Revive’s feature set is undeniably expansive, driven by its AI engine and designed to generate dynamic content quickly. The key features include:

  • AI Photo Animation: This is the core function, utilizing AI to add movement, expressions, and effects to uploaded photos. Users can select a still image and then choose from various animation styles – “dance,” “funny faces,” and more.
  • Face Filters & Effects: Beyond simple animation, Revive offers a selection of face filters that overlay digital enhancements onto the user’s photo, ranging from cartoon transformations to stylistic effects.
  • Voice Cloning (AI Voice): A notable feature allowing users to "sing" like famous artists such as Monroe, Queen, and Rihanna by applying their voices to animated videos generated from their photos. This is achieved through AI voice cloning technology.
  • Meme Maker: The app incorporates a meme maker functionality enabling users to create memes directly from their animated creations.
  • Trending Video Templates: Revive provides a curated selection of trending video templates that users can apply to their photos, further streamlining the content creation process.
  • Easy Editing Tools: Basic editing tools are included for trimming videos, adjusting speed, and adding text overlays.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to Revive’s popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The app is remarkably user-friendly. The intuitive interface guides users through the animation process with minimal technical knowledge required. The “one-tap” animation options are particularly appealing to novice creators.
  • AI Capabilities: The AI engine demonstrates a reasonable level of sophistication, producing surprisingly believable animations and voice cloning results for many images. While not perfect, it’s impressively accessible.
  • Viral Potential: The app is undeniably designed with virality in mind. The ability to create funny videos featuring famous singers or animated faces is highly shareable on platforms like TikTok and Instagram.
  • Large User Base: With over 13 million installs, Revive benefits from a sizable user base, providing a readily available audience for shared content and fostering community engagement. The high rating (4.25) suggests a generally positive user experience.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Revive has several areas that could be improved:

  • AI Accuracy: While impressive, the AI isn’t consistently perfect. Animations can sometimes appear unnatural or distorted, particularly with complex facial features or when applying numerous effects simultaneously. Voice cloning quality varies greatly depending on image quality and chosen artist.
  • Limited Customization: The current customization options are somewhat restricted. Users would benefit from more granular control over animation speed, expression intensity, and the application of filters. Advanced users may find the lack of precise controls frustrating.
  • Template Variety: While trending templates offer a starting point, expanding this library significantly would enhance user creativity and reduce reliance on pre-made options.
  • Processing Time: Generating videos with AI can sometimes be slow, particularly for complex animations or when utilizing voice cloning. Optimizing the backend processing could improve the user experience.
  • Watermark: The app applies a watermark to exported videos by default. While understandable for monetization, removing this feature would be a significant value-add for premium users.

User Experience

The user experience is primarily positive due to the intuitive interface and streamlined workflow. Navigating between features is simple, and the “one-tap” animation options are genuinely effective for creating quick and entertaining videos. The visual design is clean and modern, avoiding overwhelming the user with too much information. However, the reliance on pre-set templates can occasionally feel restrictive, limiting users' creative freedom. The app’s responsiveness could be improved; occasional lag during video processing is noticeable.

Value for Money

As a free app, Revive provides substantial value to casual users. The core animation features and filter options are entirely accessible without any in-app purchases or subscriptions. However, the voice cloning feature appears to be a premium element, offering limited uses before requiring payment. The developers could explore a tiered subscription model that unlocks advanced customization options, removes watermarks, and provides unlimited access to voice cloning.

Conclusion

Revive: Animation & AI Photos is a remarkably accessible and engaging app that successfully leverages AI technology to empower users to create fun and shareable video content. While the AI isn't flawless and customization options could be expanded, its ease of use, viral potential, and large user base contribute to its widespread popularity. For anyone looking for a simple way to add movement to their photos or create funny videos with familiar voices, Revive is definitely worth exploring. The app’s success demonstrates the growing accessibility of AI-powered creative tools. Given its free nature and substantial functionality, it represents an excellent entry point into the world of mobile animation creation.
